articles.author: Gabriele Marcotti
articles.title: Real Madrid embellish Champions League legacy in beating Liverpool for 14th European title - ESPN India
articles.description: Real Madrid have won more than twice as many European Cups as any other team, and that carefree pedigree showed in their latest win over Liverpool.
articles.content:
PARIS -- And now it's 14 Champions Leagues for Real Madrid, which is more than the next two most successful clubs in Europe -- AC Milan have seven, Liverpool six -- combined.
And now Carlo Ancelotti… [+8853 chars]

articles.author: Ruairidh Barlow
articles.title: Marcelo confirms Real Madrid departure after 15 years - Football Espana
articles.description: Real Madrid sealed their 14th Champions League with a 1-0 victory over Liverpool on Saturday night under the lights. It was arguably the least thrilling of their four knockout ties, but the it allowed them to crown one of the most epic runs in European footba…
